segments.text: This indoor scene captures a busy kitchen moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, showing the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the sink is a waterfall of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral face doesn't change even with water nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's too focused to notice the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs higher on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies are spilling out as he grabs them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up eagerly, like it's a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, but it's harmless fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the tipping stool makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage to the cabinets looks inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside yard feels worlds away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away, worried for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
